interfacePack
Interface SignalInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSignalModule, RealSignalModule1, RealSignalModule2, TestRackSimulator1, TestRackSimulator2
public interface SignalInterface

This interface defines the basic functionalities of a signal generator module

Author:
tianzhao

Method Summary
 void addListener(ModuleListener listener)
          This function adds a device as a listener to the signal generator
 boolean canGenerateData()
          This function checks if a signal generator is allowed to generate data
 void disableDataGeneration()
          This function lets a signal generator device stop generating data
 void disableReadingFromAllPorts()
          This function closes all the ports
 boolean disableReadingFromPort(int portIndex)
          This function closes port at portIndex and prevents other devices to read from this port
 void disconnectDevice(AbstractDeviceModule device)
          This function disconnects a device from the current signal generator
 void enableDataGeneration()
          This function enables a signal generator device to start generating data
 void enableReadingFromAllPorts()
          This function opens all the ports for reading
 boolean enableReadingFromPort(int portIndex)
          This function opens port at portIndex for reading
 boolean transmitDataToAllListenersAtAllPorts()
          This function transmit data to all the ports of all the listener devices
 boolean transmitDataToAllListenersAtPort(int portIndex)
          This function transmit data to port at portIndex of all the listener devices
